mapper.select:
SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_ORDER_ID, a.F_DRUG_ID, a.F_DRUG_NAME, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_PRICE, a.F_KAIPIAO_PRICE, a.F_GUOJIFEI, a.F_FANDIAN, a.F_GAOKAIFEI, a.F_MONEY, a.F_MONEY_NOTAX, a.F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE, a.F_XQ_TC, a.F_XQ_TC_MONEY, a.F_DQ_TC, a.F_DQ_TC_MONEY, b.F_SALE_USER_ID, d.F_DEPARTMENT_ID FROM t_order_detail AS a LEFT JOIN t_order b ON a.F_ORDER_ID=b.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ID=c.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_drug_only d ON c.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=d.F_ID where a.F_ORDER_ID in
#{id}
